aliases: A Study In Steampunk: Choice By Gaslight
description: Set in an alternate steampunk London, players take the role of a once army medic who now accompanies a Sherlockian freelance investigator. Half-RPG and Half-interactive novel, players guide the story to outwit criminals, enemy spies, and more occult elements in this iOS game.

executables.name: a study in steampunk choice by gaslight.app

name: A Study in Steampunk: Choice by Gaslight
